Mega-mapper change log

Release History

VersionDateDescription

1.02012-03-30First release

Release 1.0.18 - 2013-08-20

TypeChangesBy

Added script to provide a XML for ChEBI to generate their cross-references to the Enzyme Portal. This is a requirement for the compound structure search in EP.rafalcan

Updated to latest versions of rhea-util - with improved parsing of activator and inhibitors from UniProt - and biobabel-core.rafalcan

Release 1.0.17 - 2013-07-26

TypeChangesBy

web links were added to Compounds and Disease resources to enable quick access to the original compound or disease source.joseph

Release 1.0.16 - 2013-06-05

TypeChangesBy

Added application to retrieve cross-references from IntEnzXML: EC-reactions, EC-substrates/products, EC-cofactors, Rhea-reactants/products. This replaces the import from ChEBI (cofactors and catalytic activity) which was a bit fuzzy due to text mining.rafalcan

Added concrete relationships "is_substrate_of" and "is_product_of" for ChEBI-EC cross-references.rafalcan

Added UniProt-DrugBank cross-references to the mega-map.rafalcan

Added UniProt-ChEBI cross-references for activators and inhibitors to the mega-map.rafalcan

Added table uniprot2compound to be used for quick lookups.rafalcan

Added method to MegaMapper to get compounds related to UniProt IDs as Compound objects (now with a role).rafalcan

Fixed import of ChEMBL cross references. There were some extra - and wrong - due to a bug in EbeyeSaxParser. Fixes 168.rafalcan

Updated to latest version of ep-util - which provides extraction of inhibitors and activators from UniProt - and ep-domain - which provides roles for compounds.rafalcan

Release 1.0.13 - 2013-04-09

TypeChangesBy

ChEMBL compounds with names were added to the Mega Mapperjoseph

Release 1.0.10 - 2013-03-06

TypeChangesBy

Fixed query in MegaJdbcMapper.getCompounds and MegaJdbcMapper.getDisease so that underscores are taken as part of the UniProt ID prefix and not as oracle wildcards.rafalcan

PDBe entries with no names (obsolete or redirected) are not added to the mega-map any longer. Fixes 144.rafalcan

Added implementation to parse tab file from UniMed, which will replace the original HTML.rafalcan

Release 1.0.9 - 2013-02-04

TypeChangesBy

Fixed JDBC query so that underscores in UniProt prefixes are not taken as wildcards by oracle.rafalcan

Fixed scope of oracle dependency.rafalcan

Last compounds retrieved from ChEBI are not left out of the mega-map (CompoundsDAOImpl).rafalcan

Updated to latest version of parent pom file (move to GitHub), biobabel-core and junit.rafalcan

Release 1.0.8 - 2012-10-25

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0.7 - 2012-10-17

TypeChangesBy

Organism common name is reset after every UniProt entry (it wasn't, which resulted in many species having 'Human' as common name).rafalcan

Added method to retrieve cross-references based on fuzzy entry ID, database and relationship.rafalcan

Release 1.0.6 - 2012-09-20

TypeChangesBy

Modified scripts for releases: removed unnecesary build and added svn command to copy generated statistics to the trunk..rafalcan

Release 1.0.5 - 2012-09-05

TypeChangesBy

Added PDBe structure names to the mega-map.rafalcan

Added method to retrieve xrefs by relationship.rafalcan

Updated to latest versions of ep-domain and junit.rafalcan

Added dependency on ebeye-client to retrieve PDB structure names (not present in UniProt XML file).rafalcan

Removed strange unused dependencies.rafalcan

Release 1.0.4 - 2012-08-15

TypeChangesBy

Prepared statements were not closed, which resulted in lots of 'too many open cursors' exceptions in the webapp log.rafalcan

Updated to latest versions of biobabel-db and log4j.rafalcan

Release 1.0.3 - 2012-08-14

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0.2 - 2012-08-07

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0.1 - 2012-05-21

No changes in this release.

Release 1.0 - 2012-03-30

No changes in this release.
